backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, user stats, channel status tracking, and access‑controlled admin/user operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text summaries describing the purpose of key frontend components, hooks, styles, and configuration files.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting PWA metadata, icons, orientation lock styles, and loading the React app root.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, icons, and portrait-only orientation settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker providing GPRS-optimized caching with strict rules to avoid caching radio streams and external APIs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app container managing stations, audio playback, overlays, orientation lock, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AudioPlayer.tsx: Complex audio player managing playback, retries, errors, and volume with events for parent integration.
frontend/src/components/AudioSpectrumAna: Canvas-based audio spectrum visualizer using Web Audio API with animated frequency bars.
frontend/src/components/BlinkingStars.ts: Three.js component rendering many procedurally generated blinking stars with twinkling animation.
frontend/src/components/DonationModal.ts: Modal for displaying crypto donation addresses with copy-to-clipboard UI and color‑themed blocks.
frontend/src/components/FmRadioCenterOve: Centered overlay displaying a semi‑transparent FM Radio logo.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Fixed bottom footer showing the developer credit with gradient text styling.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Fullscreen loading screen with animated radio icon, text, bouncing dots, and PWA hints.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Logic and UI for prompting users to install the PWA, with deferred install handling and dismissal rules.
frontend/src/components/RadioPlaybackDis: Displays the currently playing station, manages bookmarks in localStorage, and shows country flags with fallback mappings.
frontend/src/components/SearchOverlay.ts: Provides a full-screen search overlay that filters stations by multiple fields and allows selection.
frontend/src/components/SpaceScene.tsx: Renders a simple space background with blinking stars using React Three Fiber.
frontend/src/components/TopToolbar.tsx: Implements the main toolbar with search, dashboard, login, refresh, and station selection controls.
frontend/src/components/UserDashboard.ts: Displays user dashboard with bookmarked stations and channel statistics, syncing bookmarks from localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, including login, logout, stored identity handling, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements multi-layer caching, IndexedDB storage, and lazy batch loading for radio stations with utilities to clear caches and manage fetch state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, portrait-orientation locking, glow utilities, and global transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/serviceWorkerRegistration.t: Handles service worker registration, update detection, and unregister logic for PWA offline support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions such as colors, radii, shadows, and animations, and sets file content paths.
PACKAGING_GUIDE.md: Explains how to assemble a distributable ZIP for Global FM, listing required directories, required files, and items to exclude.
project_state.json: Describes the project architecture, features, known issues, and current state metadata for Global FM.
README.md: Overview of Global FM’s 3D globe radio app with features such as interactive Earth rendering, radio playback, and user dashboard.
SETUP_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Provides a short guide for installing prerequisites and running Global FM locally.
unknown.txt: Contains support guidance for packaging issues and a brief footer attribution.
